title: Spacious Updated  3 bed 2 bath home
posting_body: Opportunity for a Beautiful Three Bedroom, Two Full Baths, North Warren Ranch that Has All The Pluses - Living Room plus Family Room with Skylight, Natural or Gas Fireplace, Large Florida Room, LaFata Cabinetry in Spacious Updated Kitchen with Ceramic Floor and Backsplash, Great Counter Space, Double Sink, Pantry, Newer Windows, Furnace and Roof - 2016, Newer Air Conditioning - Hot Water Tank - 2020, Extra Large Shed with Roof Covering Overhang, Hardwood Floors in Living Room, Hall and Under Carpet in Bedrooms, Updated Bathrooms, All Appliances to Remain, Within Walking Distance of Schools, Extra Wide Lot, Partially Finished Full Basement With Great Storage Areas.
MESSAGE ME WITH A NUMBER TO SCHEDULE A SHOWING!
